title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 254.2 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 254.2 - General

State Regulations

The foregoing designations are not to be construed to limit
the power of the board to make such special designations of agents as may be
necessary to effectuate the purposes of SERA, nor shall the foregoing
designations be construed as limiting the power of the board at any time to
confer upon its agent or agents additional duties. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
